 3. Entry Process 

 3.1 GENERAL SUBMISSION GUIDELINES: 

 • The registration fee for this event is RS. 30. 

 • Entries will be accepted only in digital format. 

 • An entrant can submit a maximum of 2 photographs. 

 • Entries received without fees will not be accepted. 

 • The entry fees once paid is not refundable. 

 • Photos should be submitted in a pen drive or a compact disk on the day of the event. 

 • Both colour and monochrome photographs are acceptable.
